channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Massive pot hole which poses damage risk to a car. Makes a load bang noise when driven over, 25th January

item.title: Entire road not fit, 25th January
item.description:

item.title: Pothole very deep outside 114 Greenhills Road. Caused a burst tyre . This road is disintegrating and needs resurfacing , not just patching up, 25th January
item.description:
On the Eastbound side of Greenhills Road outside number 114. This hs been present fur a few weeks and the road surface is deteriorating to the extent where the pothole caused me a burst tyre

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Greenhills Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
